00018 #include "cstylelist.h"
00019 #include "cstyleeditordialog.h"

00021 #include <qheader.h>

00029 CStyleList::CStyleList(CPrinter* printer, StyleItemList* items, QWidget *parent, const char *name )
00030     : KListView(parent,name), m_items(items), m_printer(printer)
00031 {
00032     initView(); 
00033     setItems(m_items);  
00034 }
00035 
00036 CStyleList::~CStyleList(){
00037     for (m_items->first(); m_items->current(); m_items->next()) {
00038         m_items->current()->deleteListViewItem();
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00043 void CStyleList::initView(){
00044     addColumn(i18n("Name:"));
00045     header()->hide();
00046 }
00047 
00049 void CStyleList::insertItems( StyleItemList* itemList ){
00050     for(itemList->first(); itemList->current(); itemList->next() ) {
00051         if (itemList != m_items)    //check if we do not insert our own m_items list
00052             m_items->append( itemList->current() );
00053         QListViewItem* item = itemList->current()->listViewItem(this);
00054     }
00055     updateStyleCombo();
00056 }
00057 
00059 void CStyleList::setItems( StyleItemList* itemList ){
00060     for (m_items->first(); m_items->current(); m_items->next()) {
00061         if (m_items->current())
00062             m_items->current()->deleteListViewItem();
00063     }
00064 
00065     if (m_items != itemList)
00066         m_items->clear();
00067     insertItems(m_items);   
00068 
00069     QListViewItemIterator it( this );
00070     if (it.current())
00071         setCurrentItem(it.current());
00072     emit currentChanged(it.current());
00073 }
00074 
00076 void CStyleList::insertItem( CStyle* item ){
00077     m_items->append( item );
00078     item->listViewItem(this);
00079 }
00080 
00082 void CStyleList::editCurrentStyle(){
00083     QListViewItem*  item = currentItem();
00084     if (!item)
00085         return;
00086         
00087     //go through style items and find the right one
00088     CStyle* currentStyle = 0;
00089     for (m_items->first(); m_items->current();m_items->next()) {
00090         if (m_items->current()->listViewItem() == item) {
00091             currentStyle = m_items->current();
00092             break;
00093         }
00094     }
00095     if (currentStyle) {
00096         openStyleEditor( currentStyle );        
00097         currentStyle->updateListViewItem();
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00102 void CStyleList::createNewStyle(){
00103     CStyle* style = new CStyle();   
00104     insertItem( style );
00105     
00106     openStyleEditor( style );
00107     
00108     style->updateListViewItem();
00109 }
00110 
00112 void CStyleList::openStyleEditor( CStyle* const style ){
00113     {
00114         CStyleEditorDialog dlg(style, this);
00115         dlg.exec();
00116     }
00117     updateStyleCombo();
00118 }
00119 
00121 void CStyleList::deleteCurrentStyle(){
00122     QListViewItem* item = currentItem();
00123     if (!item)
00124         return;
00125     if (item->text(0) == i18n("Standard")) {
00126         qWarning("Deleting the standardstyle is not possible");
00127         return;
00128     }
00129     
00130     //go through style items and find the right one
00131     CStyle* currentStyle = 0;
00132     for (m_items->first(); m_items->current();m_items->next()) {
00133         if (m_items->current()->listViewItem() == item) {
00134             currentStyle = m_items->current();
00135             m_items->remove(currentStyle);
00136             currentStyle->deleteListViewItem();         
00137             if (!m_items->autoDelete() && currentStyle) {
00138                 delete currentStyle;            
00139                 currentStyle = 0;
00140             }   
00141             updateStyleCombo();                 
00142             return;
00143         }
00144     }
00145 }
00146 
00148 void CStyleList::updateStyleCombo(){
00149     if (m_printer)
00150         m_printer->emitStylesChanged();
00151 }
00152 
00154 StyleItemList* CStyleList::styleList(){
00155     return m_items;
00156 }
